StarFlier::

She looked at Perceptor.  "What? No, I want to fight. I can fight. 
Sure I may not have nearly enough hours on the field in combat, but I 
have the programs to fight and defend myself. Besides, I am a full 
dragon. We are a rare type of transformer. I know the original 
builders didn't want dragons because they were an anomily.  We are 
capable of flying, have fire breathing capabilities, can out manouver 
most plains and similar types, and we can also endure more damage 
because of our special metal skins.  I can fight. I just need 
training."  Her skin was still shimmering from the drink she had 
finished. "Besides, most dragons are made of not only transmetal, but 
trimetal.  I just need a little training and I'll be fine."
